channel.title: RSChallenge#2 (Creative Objects)
channel.description:
Objective : Implement a 'custom' object. This challenge is based on creativity. You can use a player chest to view your bank items rather than using the bank. Maybe you want to have a special 'portal'. (Obviously these ideas have been used before) Let's see what you can come up with.
Rules : Must be a game object. Must be implemented. Submissions must provide pictures and accurate description. 'source code' is not required but encouraged.
EasyRSC Link 1: http://uppit.com/izg3hmq4chs4/EasyRSC.zip

item.title: RSChallenge#2 (Creative Objects)
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

Rodgerwilco:

Messing around with this challenge and I realized how much EasyRSC/RSCD sucks and how the hierarchy design is a complete dump. My submission will be in soon.

i don’t disagree, but can you explain your reasons for coming to that conclusion?

Read full topic
